comments:
Hi ,
I downloaded the Eclipse IDE 3.2.0 from the site (http://www.yoxos.com/) .It is working fine but when i use the JAVA API (or Click on the API Class with ctrl) it does not decompile the code and give some error that pasted below ,Please suggest me whta to Do to get the java class at my IDE

Jadclipse is an extra plugin. You have to file the bug against them. I assume this is possible on http://sourceforge.net/projects/jadclipse
